title: I need help please
content:
I really need help finding this font. I have tried all of the usual sources and am out of ideas.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109063350im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo_4195.jpg)

 [‹ Identifying two simple serif designs...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109063350/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38822 "Go to previous forum topic") [GoRVing.com Serif Caps ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109063350/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38818 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rjbennett

comments.content:
Perfect ;-p  
I thank you very much, client had no clue what font was used in the logo.

Again thank you.
